Articles.Content:
Hey there, I would love to replace my KSP music with some badass music from interstellar, does anyone know how to?

Thank you very much for your attention!
There used to be a mod for this, but unfortunately it is not up to date and doesn't work in v1.2.x.
Sadly i believe they are buried deep inside the gamedata squad folder, i suggest muting ksp music, and playing your own in the background.
